argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcdsmul.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lcdsmul.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lcdsmul.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 4 |  | lcdsmul.l | |- L = ( Base ` F ) |
| 5 |  | lcdsmul.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` F ) |
| 6 |  | lcdsmul.c | |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) |
| 7 |  | lcdsmul.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` C ) |
| 8 |  | lcdsmul.m | |- .xb = ( .r ` S ) |
| 9 |  | lcdsmul.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 10 |  | lcdsmul.x | |- ( ph -> X e. L ) |
| 11 |  | lcdsmul.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. L ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppR ` F ) = ( oppR ` F ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 12, 6, 7, 9 | #P_lcdsca | |- ( ph -> S = ( oppR ` F ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( .r ` S ) = ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 14 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> .xb = ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ph -> ( X .xb Y ) = ( X ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) Y ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) = ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) |
| 18 | 4, 5, 12, 17 | #P_opprmul | |- ( X ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) Y ) = ( Y .x. X ) |
| 19 | 16, 18 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( ph -> ( X .xb Y ) = ( Y .x. X ) ) |
